story.iWant: to log out of my account
story.soThat: I can securely end my session
story.tasks: - [ ] Task 1 (AC: #1, #2, #3) - [ ] Create a logout button in the application's header or user menu. - [ ] Task 2 (AC: #3) - [ ] Implement the `signOut` function from NextAuth.js to handle the logout process. - [ ] Task 3 (AC: #3) - [ ] Configure the `signOut` function to redirect the user to the landing page after logout. - [ ] Task 4 (AC: #1, #2, #3) - Testing - [ ] Write a test to verify that a logged-in user can see the logout button. - [ ] Write a test to verify that clicking the logout button calls the `signOut` function. - [ ] Write a test to verify that after logging out, the user is redirected to the landing page.

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. **Given** I am logged in 2. **When** I click the logout button 3. **Then** I am logged out and redirected to the landing page.
